text: Theodore Jameson Sophocleus (May 28, 1939 â€“ June 8, 2018) was an American politician. He was born in Baltimore, Maryland. He was a member of the Democratic Party. He was a pharmacist and a drug store chain executive. Sophocleus served as a member of the Maryland House of Delegates from 1993 to 1995 and again from 1999 until his death in 2018. Sophocleus died of heart failure at a Baltimore hospital on June 8, 2018 at the age of 79. ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from heart failure Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Businesspeople from Baltimore Category:Politicians from Baltimore Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Pharmacists
title: Theodore J. Sophocleus
